sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; const initData = { pre_heading: "Explore", heading: "Exclusive Digital Assets", content: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Laborum obcaecati dignissimos quae quo ad iste ipsum officiis deleniti asperiores sit.", filter_1: "All", filter_2: "Gaming Assets", filter_3: "Collectibles", } const data = [ { id: "1", img: "/img/Coatofarms.gif", group: '["art","sports"]', title: "Walking On Air", owner: "Richard", price: "1.5 ETH", count: "1 of 1", btnText: "Check it Out" }, { id: "3", img: "/img/Guanacodesert.jpg", group: '["art","music"]', title: "Trading Cards", owner: "Arham", price: "2.3 ETH", count: "1 of 1", btnText: "Check it Out" }, { id: "4", img: "/img/joshrevolution.gif", group: '["sports","art","music"]', title: "Industrial Revolution", owner: "Yasmin", price: "1.8 ETH", count: "1 of 1", btnText: "Check it Out" }, { id: "5", img: "/img/khrool.jpg", group: '["music","sports","collectibles"]', title: "Utility", owner: "Junaid", price: "1.7 ETH", count: "1 of 1", btnText: "Check it Out" }, { id: "7", img: "/img/joshrevolution.gif", group: '["art","sports"]', title: "Cartoon Heroes", owner: "Junaid", price: "3.2 ETH", count: "1 of 1", btnText: "Check it Out" }, { id: "10", img: "/img/dockMap.jpg", group: '["art","music"]', title: "Zed Run", owner: "SpaceMan", price: "3.7 ETH", count: "1 of 1", btnText: "Check it Out" }, { id: "11", img: "/img/nft11.gif", group: '["sports","art","music"]', title: "Rare Tyres", owner: "Monas", price: "2.2 ETH", count: "1 of 1", btnText: "Check it Out" }, { id: "12", img: "/img/warehouseMap.jpg", group: '["music","sports","collectibles"]', title: "World of Women", owner: "Victor", price: "4.3 ETH", count: "1 of 1", btnText: "Check it Out" } ] class ExploreThree extends Component { state = { initData: {}, data: [] } componentDidMount(){ this.setState({ initData: initData, data: data }) } render() { return (
{/* Intro */}
{this.state.initData.pre_heading}

{this.state.initData.heading}

{this.state.initData.content}

{/* Explore Menu */}
{this.state.data.map((item, idx) => { return (
{/* Card Caption */}
{/* Card Body */}
{item.title}
{item.price} {item.count}
{item.btnText}
); })}
); } } export default ExploreThree;
